XZ.sql:
select m.mainFaultGenerantPriv as province_name, (select max(areaname) from taw_system_area where areaid = m.mainFaultGenerantCity )as city_name, m.sheetid as faultOrderId, rtrim(m.title) as orderTheme,m.maingroupcustomcode as customerId,m.maingroupcustomname as customerName,m.mainmonitorlevel as customerLev, m.mainmonitorlevel as customerLevId,'' as customerType,'' as customerTypeId, m.status as status,''as busType,'' as busTypeId, m.mainproductidentify as proId,m.maincircuitnumber as circuitName,m.mainGroupCustomLevel as assuranceLev,m.mainGroupCustomLevel as assuranceLevId,
m.mainAlarmId as alarmId,m.mainNetName as alarmNet,rtrim(m.mainequipmentid) as alarmEquipmentId, m.mainEquipmentFactory as alarmEquipmentCompany,m.mainequipmenttype as alarmEquipmentType,m.mainAlarmSource as alarmName, '' as alarmType,rtrim(m.mainAlarmDesc) as alarmDetail, m.mainFaultGenerantTime as AlarmStartTime,m.sendTime as orderStartTime, m.sheetCompleteLimit as limitTime,m.endTime as orderEndTime,
(select max(linkFaultDealResult) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as faultResult, (select max(linkFaultDealResult) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as faultResultId, (select taskname from centralcommonfault_task where sheetkey=m.id and taskstatus!='5' and taskname<>'cc') as orderState, (select taskname from centralcommonfault_task where sheetkey=m.id and taskstatus!='5' and taskname<>'cc') as orderStateId, (select min(taskstatus) from centralcommonfault_task where sheetkey=m.id and taskstatus!='5' ) as taskstatus,
'' as isContactCustomer,'' as contactCustomerFirstTime,'' as pretreatmentTime,'' as preanalysisReason, '' as preanalysisReasonId, '' as isSucPreanalysis,'' as taskTransferTime, '' as maintenanceCompany, (select min(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and mainid = m.id group by mainid ) as maintenanceStartTime, (select max(rtrim(linkFaultDealResult)) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as maintenanceDetail, (select max(linkFaultDealResult) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as maintenanceResult, (select max(linkFaultDealResult) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) )as maintenanceResultId, '' as isvisite, '' as arriveSceneTime,m.mainAlarmSolveDate as removeAlarmTime, (select max (linkfaultavoidtime) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as recoFaultTime, (select max(areaname) from taw_system_area where areaid = m.mainFaultGenerantCity ) as faulteChargeableCityName, '' as isoverTime,'' as overTimeResion,'' as problemResion,'' as isConfirmResult, (select max(linkcheckresult) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and activeTemplateid='CheckingHumTask' and operateType='56' group by mainid ) ) as qcResult, (select max(rtrim(linkcheckcontent)) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid = m.id and activeTemplateid='CheckingHumTask' and operateType='56' group by mainid ) ) as qcResult, m.mainNetSortTwo as faultType,m.mainNetSortTwo as faultTypeId, '' as accessWay,'' as enterpriseId,'' as serviceId, (select max(linkIfGreatFault) from centralcommonfault_link where mainid=m.id and activeTemplateid='FirstExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' ) as isVolumeFault, '' as terminalType,'' as calledNumberCityName,'' as ecsiType, '' as accgateIp,'' as accgateId,'' as mpiagSendMegTime,'' as isSusResponse,'' as mpiagResReportTime, '' as isSucResReport,'' as apnName,'' as tunnelType,'' as vpnInstantiation, '' as ceIp,'' as customerIp from centralcommonfault_main m left join (select distinct mainid from centralcommonfault_link where operateTime>='@beginTime@' and operateTime<='@endTime@' ) l on m.id = l.mainid where m.id = l.mainid and (m.sendTime>='@beginTime@' and m.sendTime<='@endTime@') and m.deleted = '0' and m.mainNetSortOne='101010405'
